data.message:
Fucking around lol

I got a sore tooth but that doesn't stop me from spitting raw in the booth, I speak the truth unlike a market salesman trying to sell more fruit and phony shoes...Kim jong was once addicted to gay whores and cheap booze... He thinks his shit don't stink, haha he needs to rethink his situation before the world shows domination and drains his army down the toilet to sanitation and condemn his damn nation, what's with his haircut? It looks like he escaped from a mushroom plantation, he looks like he's addicted to masturbation, let's face it... He's full off shit he should quit whilst he's ahead, but he won't because he's into paying gay men giving him straight head on his father's hay bench oops I meant grave bed would somebody just hurry and pump him full off grey led.... Lol

replies.message: Eminem should I pursue a career? You inspire me man
